Wore on vacation. Really loved these

Soft a comfortable. Just a bit on the big side, but super flattering.

I just wore it open because it's way too tight.

I get to try and play, no harm no foul.
Love the length and colors of this Jacket.

SO bright and colourful, it really jazzes up a plain outfit! I wore with jeans and bright dresses. I love that the sleeves are wider at the wrist. but then it has that tight bomber look when zipped. Close to buying this one, might consider when I rent it again!

I LOVED this. Perhaps my favorite item from my box this month. It's light enough that you can really wear it as a part of your outfit rather than just a piece of outerwear you're destined to take off. I got so many compliments on it and I would totally buy it but it's just a smidge too expensive.
great pattern but jacket is pretty stiff and boxy. The bottom band is tight (if you were planning to zip it up_
I'm not that into flowers and too many colors, but I wanted to try to wear a colorful piece. And this jacket was amazing! I wore it with jeans and white tee and it felt really nice.
light jacket great for a pop of color/ interest
The embroidery was beautiful. The colors were vibrant. This jacket is thin so it’s great for warmer temperatures. I wore it to my baby shower and many other occasions.

links_reviews_title: can be dressed up or down
links_reviews_text: loved it, very stylish and can be dressed up or down. Looked brand new.
Such a beautiful jacket, got so many compliments on it!
This got so many compliments. The embroidered bomber style worked with casual and slightly more formal business outfits. I loved it.
Such a killer jacket! I received a ton of compliments every time I wore this. Fits great and the colors are vibrant.
This jacket has pretty embroidery on it for sure! It is thin and lightweight. It runs short so if you’re long waisted like me, beware. Otherwise pretty TTS.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to love but it is a little "Granny-ish" on!
links_reviews_text: I'm 46 so maybe that explains my granny feeling! On a younger person it may well just look cool and trendy. On me it felt like the day jacket a grandma would wear. The elasticated bottom is awkward.

The elastic at the waist made the jacket ride up a little on me when it was fully zipped. Otherwise I would have kept it since the fabric was just stunning.
I love it - so many compliments, perfect accent if most of your closet is basics

This jacket is THE BEST. I cannot even begin to tell you how many compliments I received on it. It quickly has become my go to jacket especially for that pop of color my wardrobe desperately needed. My friends all want the jacket too now. It truly is for everyone and fits every body type. Loved it so much I had to buy it!
Got tons of compliments on this jacket. Super easy to dress up or dress down
I loved the colors and comfort of this jacket! If I didn’t live in a place that only had a few days to wear this/year I would have loved it more.

This is exactly why I love the idea of rental. I liked wearing this, but probably wouldn't wear it often enough to justify spending the money and taking up the room in my closet. Was expecting much higher quality of fabric and embroidery. The jacket fits way too small. Colors are pretty but I'm usually a small/med and I couldn't zip it up even with the elastic in the back.

Felt so pretty in this! Soft!
I liked this shirt but dinging one star because it was more cream colored than white when it arrived. It was super comfy and paired cute with jeans and a fun hat. I wore it for a backyard happy hour.
I loved this so much I bought it. It's versatile - can dress up or down. Love that it's a jersey fabric - feels like a dressed up t-shirt!
Very cute but very wide. I felt like a pregnant whale in it. Might size down and try again as it is very pretty.
Never wore it. Tried it on and loved the fit but it was pretty beat up. Maybe I will try again.

This shirt is great --- flattering in ways that surprised me --- love the freedom of movement, the design, and even the higher neck. I totally bought this one. *I get loads of compliments on this one every single time I have a meeting on Zoom.
Got lots of compliments and comfortable material.
Loved the neckline detail. The t-shirt material has me a little concerned about how it’s gonna hold up (but bc it’s t-shirt material it’s super soft!!) I loved it enough to buy it❤️
A sweet summer top
Love this shirt. It has the cutest little lacey-knitted details and a mock turtle neck. It was super comfy, but still appropriate for work.
Loved this shirt. Comfy & flowy, perfect crop. Lots of complements, will rent again. Styled it with light wash distressed denim and with green cargo pants

This could have been super cute. I loved the sleeves and the lace detail. The cut was a little strange because it's shorter in the back. I guess i should have paid more attention to the photos. It's definitely oversized.
Such a sweet dress. Great sleeves and perfect lengths. Low cut. Pattern is so cute.
One of my favorite Nuuly items. This dress is exquisite. The sleeves are just amazing. I felt like a million bucks!

I like the style it was a little long...the arms pulled a little. Didn’t wear it too fancy for quarantine

links_reviews_title: Way too low cut for larger breasts!

If I had more occasions to wear dresses like this, I definitely would have purchased. I loved the way it fit snug around my bust and flowed loose in all the right places. I could see how it might be a difficult fit for bustier women, as it does cut deep.

links_reviews_title: This dress truly is a dream!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a couple of concerts. Styled it with heeled booties and a jean jacket the first time and with a fur vest the second time. So many compliments! The front cut is pretty low which worked well for me since I am an A cup but might show off a lot for more well endowed gals. Will definitely rent again.

This dress was beautiful, just extremely low cut in the bust! Also, while the sleeve are stunning, they are very long and kept getting caught on things. I rented my usual size 4 and definitely should have sized down - the waist area ran big.

I love the fit of this dress. I could see how a larger bust might have issues with the top as it is the most fitted part of the dress. I enjoyed the puffy sleeves and flow of the dress. links_reviews_title: True to Size, Low Cut, Structured Bust
links_reviews_text: True to size, flowing maxi, voluminous sleeves, low cut, and structure bust, might be difficult for larger busts

links_reviews_title: I felt like a Bond girl!
links_reviews_text: This dress was magical. Perfectly shimmery, super fun with the uneven sleeve look. I loved it for a formal wedding! It was a tad long though so if you're shorter than 5'6'' you may need some very tall heels.

links_reviews_title: Sexy and professional- a rare combo
links_reviews_text: Loved, considering buying in the future
Thick high quality material. Bright color. Gorgeous dress. On the dressy side.

Wanted to wear for a st Patrick’s day party but that didn’t pan out! So just wore it at home and thought it was quite comfortable. Normally wear size M so got a size L - it was a little loose but I think fit well enough that M would’ve been too tight. Size up!

Could not get this dress zippered on the side. Runs small. The color was also way greener than it looks in pictures, so probably would not have worn even if it did fit.
wanted this to work, cute and liked the material and flow of it. but unless youre completely flat chested I dont know how this will fit..

Everything fit nicely, just wasnʻt prepared for such a low V as the model picture doesnʻt look that low cut.

love everything about this! didn't have a chance to wear it out during the month, but bought it anyways because I know it will be a go-to for warm weather dressing. the wide leg + cinched waist are super flattering, the tie details in front & back are super cute, & the boho print / comfy fabric combo is a dream for sunny days (though the jumpsuit could definitely work layered under a jacket or sweater, too). fantastic!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and so easy to wear

fabric was a little weird but I'm into it

Loved how this dress looked and fit. Contemplating buying it it’s so cute!

I want to buy this! I loved wearing it. Great pattern. Lays nicely. So pretty.
this skirt was super cute!

nice quality and super cute on! it fits, but i wish i had chosen a larger size as it’s definitely meant to be worn oversized - especially if you’re taller you’ll want to size up so it hits below your waist

Cool t-shirt, fits comfortably.
